sentences.sentence: They need to immunize teams against group think: Hackman argued that the best ones contain "deviants".
sentences.translation: 他们需要让团队免受群体思维的影响：哈克曼认为，最好的团队包含“偏差”。

sentences.sentence: Ambulances were rushed in and teams of doctors and nurses from other areas helped immunize survivors against disease.
sentences.translation: 救护车从外地匆匆开进灾区，外地医疗队的医生和护士们帮助幸存者增强抗病能力。

sentences.sentence: All countries should immunize their health-care workers as a first priority to protect the essential health infrastructure.
sentences.translation: 作为首要优先重点，所有国家应为其卫生保健工作者提供免疫以保障必要的卫生基础设施。
